full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SDE BRGYAD GSER SKYEMS BDE LEGS CHAR 'BEB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES SDE BRGYAD GSER SKYEMS BDE LEGS CHAR 'BEB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ,ZHI DRAG GIS LAS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR DUS MA YIN GYI RLUNG BU YUG THAN PA MU GI NAD YAMS SOGS KYI 'TSE MANG PA'I DUS 'DIR 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS PAR NAN CHE BA LI SKU SKYES DPAL LHUN GYIS SGRUB PA SANGS RGYAS YE SHES MDZAD PA'I SDE BRGYAD KYI GSER SKYEMS KYI DPE RNYING ZHIG LA GZHIR BYAS NAS BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI, DPYOD YANGS DGE SLONG TSUL NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG @004B 'GRO RNAMS BDE SKYID KYI DPAL LA RTAG TU ROL PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SER BA BSRUNG BA BSRE'U GSO BA, ZOR LA BEN MDOS GLUD BTOD LA SOGS, LAS RNAMS GAD SNGON DU 'GRO'O, ,SDE BRGYAD KYI MTSO 'DI MED NA, BYIS PAS KHAR LAS BYED PA 'DRA LAS BYA SNGON DU 'GRO DGOS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
